terms.definition: A legal contract outlining the terms and conditions between a client and a self-employed individual who performs work or provides services.
At this present time; often used in legal documents to introduce the operative part of an agreement.
For that reason; consequently; often used to introduce the main actions or agreements after the background information.
Considering that; by reason of the fact that; typically used in preambles to state background facts or intentions.
In exchange for; as a payment or incentive for something else, forming a key part of a contract's enforceability.

terms.term: made and entered into as of
terms.definition: Refers to the specific date on which an agreement was officially created and became effective.
Agreements and commitments exchanged by all parties involved, binding them to act or not act in certain ways.
Finishing a task or project to an acceptable standard that meets the requirements.
Having exclusive accountability and liability for a particular action, outcome, or obligation without shared blame.
Formal communication or information provided in a tangible, documented format, such as a letter or email.
